movies.title: Taking Chance
movies.plot: Lt. Col. Michael Strobl, a volunteer military escort accompanies the body of Lance Cpl. Chance Phelps to his hometown in Wyoming.
movies.awards: Won 1 Golden Globe. Another 6 wins & 27 nominations.

events.title: Michael Strobl reads about the death of Chance Phelps
Michael Strobl collects Chance Phelps' body
